mobile.name: warg vicious
mobile.long_description: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
mobile.description: It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur. Saliva is dripping quickly from its long, white fangs. It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

mobile.name: warg ferocious
mobile.long_description: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
mobile.description: It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur. Saliva is dripping quickly from its long, white fangs. It looks quite dangerous and very angry.

mobile.name: wolf grey
mobile.long_description: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobile.description: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

mobile.name: wolf black
mobile.long_description: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
mobile.description: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.

mobile.name: tree ancient
mobile.long_description: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
mobile.description:
Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground. Something about it makes you think that this is not a normal oak tree.
The enormous grey trunk shivers slightly, as if sighing deeply.

mobile.name: tree ancient
mobile.long_description: A huge, ancient tree towers above you.
mobile.description:
Its roots are extremely big and large parts of them are above ground. Something about it makes you think that this is not a normal oak tree.
The enormous grey trunk emits a deep, moaning sound.

mobile.name: dragon green
mobile.long_description: A huge green dragon is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.
mobile.description: This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its colossal body. Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as does the nicks in the horns on its head. It smells as disgusting as only dragons do.

mobile.name: spider poisonous
mobile.long_description: A huge, poisonous spider is here.
mobile.description: This disgusting creature is at the size of a human crawling on all four. It has eight hairy legs that gives it a tremendous speed on almost any surface and sharp poisonous fangs to paralyze or kill its prey.

mobile.name: queen spider
mobile.long_description: The huge, bulky Queen spider is here.
mobile.description: This disgusting creature is at the size of a small elephant. It has eight huge, hairy legs that would give it a tremendous speed on almost any surface if it wasn't so immensely fat. Its large, bulbous eyes stare back at you.

mobile.name: shargugh brownie
mobile.long_description: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.
mobile.description: This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and long tangled brown beard. He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks as if he is having great fun.

mobile.name: elder druid
mobile.long_description: The Elder druid is here. He looks very upset about your presence in his home.
mobile.description: The druid looks quite old. You would think of him as venerable but yet you know he would be a tough foe.

mobile.name: isha elf
mobile.long_description: Isha the Dark Elf is here, observing you silently.
mobile.description: She is no less than beautiful, skin as dark as the night and hair shining like silver in the moonlight. Her slender body is adorned with a sleeveless shirt and a short skirt made from black scales joined with silver threads. Her back is covered by a large, hooded cloak as black as her skin and in her broad silver belt hangs a long, slender sword in a silver scabbard.
